settings.heading: MR MOULD Mould Removal & Prevention Kit

settings.title: Dual-Action Treatment
settings.text: Say goodbye to stubborn mould infestations and prevent regrowth with the MR MOULD Mould Removal and Prevention Kit, offering a dual-action treatment for cleaner, healthier living environments.

settings.title: Fast Acting Mould Removal
settings.text: Experience astonishing visual results in less than three minutes with MR MOULD Mould Eliminator, a fast-acting bleach-based cleaner formulated to swiftly remove mould and mildew from various household surfaces.

settings.title: Long-term Fungicidal Protection
settings.text: Enjoy long-term protection against mould infestations with MR MOULD Mould Sanitiser, delivering a biocidal solution that kills mould spores and sterilizes treated areas to prevent regrowth.

settings.title: Easy to Use
settings.text: Make mould treatment a breeze with the MR MOULD Mould Removal and Prevention Kit, requiring minimal effort and time for effective results, allowing you to tackle mould-affected surfaces in under 30 minutes.

settings.title: Comprehensive Kit Components
settings.text: Benefit from comprehensive kit components, including two bottles of MR MOULD Mould Eliminator, one bottle of MR MOULD Mould Sanitiser, a microfiber cloth, and a pair of protective rubber gloves, ensuring you have everything you need for effective mould removal and prevention.

settings.title: Astonishing Visual Results
settings.text: Witness astonishing visual results with MR MOULD Mould Eliminator, watching as mould stains vanish before your eyes, restoring surfaces to their former glory in record time.

settings.heaing: Swift Removal of Mould and Mildew
settings.title: Swift Removal of Mould and Mildew
settings.text: Swiftly remove mould and mildew from walls, ceilings, floors, and various household surfaces with MR MOULD Mould Eliminator, providing effective cleaning power without the need for extensive scrubbing.

settings.text: Benefit from the biocidal solution in MR MOULD Mould Sanitiser, which not only kills mould spores but also sterilizes treated areas, ensuring long-term protection against regrowth.

settings.text: Enjoy a hassle-free mould treatment process with the MR MOULD Mould Removal and Prevention Kit, requiring minimal effort and time for maximum effectiveness, allowing you to maintain cleaner, healthier living spaces with ease.

settings.heading: How Mr Mould - Anti-mould Spray Works
PREPARE
settings.text: Ensure the affected area is clean and dry before application. Remove any visible Mould or mildew by scrubbing the surface with soap and water. Allow the area to dry completely before proceeding.

settings.heading: APPLY
settings.text: Shake the MR MOULD - Anti-Mould Spray bottle well before use. Hold the bottle upright and spray the affected area from a distance of approximately 20-30 centimeters. Apply a generous amount of spray to thoroughly cover the Mould or mildew-infested surface.

settings.heading: WAIT
settings.text: Allow the spray to sit on the surface for the specified amount of time indicated on the product label. This typically ranges from several minutes to an hour, depending on the severity of the Mould or mildew growth.

settings.heading: CLEAN
settings.text: After the designated wait time, use a clean cloth or sponge to wipe away the excess spray and any remaining Mould or mildew residue. Rinse the area with water and allow it to dry completely.

settings.heading: PREVENT
settings.text:
To prevent future Mould or mildew growth, consider addressing any underlying moisture issues in the area. Improve ventilation, repair leaks, and reduce humidity levels to create an environment less conducive to Mould and mildew growth.

Using MR MOULD - Anti-Mould Spray regularly can help effectively eliminate Mould and mildew and prevent their return.
Superior Mould Resistance
